titles.title: Gulf of Mexico Economic Recovery and Job Impact Analysis Act of 2010
A bill to require a study of the effect of a 6-month moratorium on new deepwater drilling in the Gulf of Mexico on small businesses.
Gulf of Mexico Economic Recovery and Job Impact Analysis Act of 2010

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Small Business and Entrepreneurship.

bill.summary: Gulf of Mexico Economic Recovery and Job Impact Analysis Act of 2010 - Requires the Office of Advocacy of the Small Business Administration (SBA) to: (1) conduct a study evaluating the effect on small businesses of a six-month moratorium on new deepwater drilling in the Gulf of Mexico; and (2) report study results to the congressional small business and energy committees.
